title: Cannot compose in body text mode
creator: hpnpilot
content:
Hi,

I am using Thunderbird 128.10.2esr (64-bit).

In settings, composition I have the "use paragraph format" box unchecked.

When I compose an email, hitting Enter causes an extra line feed to be inserted. Thus I need to go back over lists, addresses and so forth to manually change back to body text. I would like to not have to do this.

Is there another setting that will allow composition entirely in body text style? I am also set to send in plain text only.

Peter
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:135.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/135.0

title: Freezing while composing
creator: mortganeles
content: While composing an email, Thunderbird freezes, then fades. I'm able to "X" out to close Thunderbird and to restart it. I have the latest Thunderbird version (138.02 64 bit) installed. How can I stop these intermittent freezes?

title: Login Failure on new computer only
creator: jfhart
content: I recently bought a new computer and trying to use Thunderbird for my ATT/Yahoo mail like I did on my old computer. I keep getting a login failed message on my new computer. I moved my profile over from my old computer, all passwords and settings exactly the same. I can still use Thunderbird on my old computer, but it won't work on the new one. What am I doing wrong?

title: Installation de thunderbird
creator: alanmdp
content: Je veux installer Thunderbird mais je ne peux pas car je dois d'abord faire un don. Thunderbird n'est donc pas gratuit . Pour moi je l'installe , je le teste , et si je suis satisfait je fais très, volontiers un don mais pas l'inverse. Merci de répondre à ma question car cela fait plusieurs fois que j'essaye de l'installer. cordialement alan

title: Armazenamento de mensagens
creator: jose.sebusiani
content:
Prezados, Utilizo a versão "128.10.2esr" do Thunderbird. Tenho a necessidade de armazenar determinadas mensagens em sub-pastas específicas dentro do grupo "pastas de armazenamento".... Até há algum tempo atrás, fazia isto " arrastando as mensagens" para uma determinada sub-pasta específica. Hoje o Thunderbird não está permitindo que eu conclua tal " arraste" e armazena a mensagem numa sub-pasta específica... 

Quem medidas/configurações devo adotar para voltar a ter tal facilidade? Obrigado. José Mauro Sebusiani  >( Usuario: jose.sebusiani@gmail.com)
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:138.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/138.0

title: Cannot start the specified application
creator: geom.nino.marino
content: Good morning, I have a problem. When I try to start Thunderbird, an error window pops up with the following message: "Cannot start the specified application. The application's side-by-side configuration is incorrect. Please review the application event log or use the command-line tool sxstrace.exe for more details." How can I solve this problem? Thank you.

title: emails with url link not being received.
creator: jgerstne
content:
I use a photo posting site for some photography I do and used to be able to post a link to an image in an email and the recipient could click on the link and open the image. Recently the email is shown as being sent but the recipient does not receive it. As a test sent the same email to a gmail address I use on occasion and Thunderbird shows it as being sent but it does not show in my gmail inbox.

If I convert the URL to a "tiny URL tiny URL" it works fine.

Here is a link to the original URL of the photo on a site (pbase.com) that appears to have been sent as a link in and email, but its never received. If the URL is copied and pasted into browser it does open up:

https://a4.pbase.com/o12/24/696224/1/175455898.qduVpeTI.Kyle1_MG_3689.jpg

and the link converted to a tiny URL: https://tinyurl.com/36yyspdf

Any help would be appreciated :)

thanks, Mike....hope this makes sense

p.s.: FWIW its a photo used for some coastal tidal research
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:138.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/138.0

title: Thunderbird che scarica da capo tutte le vecchie email
creator: rambof
content:
Purtroppo dopo molti anni di "onorato servizio" thunderbird adesso vuole scaricare da capo tutte le mail della mia casella (oltre 15.000 email). Ho un account POP (e non IMAP).

Come posso fare per scaricare solamente i nuovi messaggi escludendo quindi tutte le vecchie mail che invece ho già in archivio ?

Grazie mille!
